answers.answer: Thanks for using the forum.I would recommend that you ask your doctor. Many of the muscle rubs have a warning for pregnant women to check with their doctor prior to using. I don't know of one specifically formulated for pregnancy. Your doctor may know of something that is safe with both your pregnancy and your diabetes.Congratulations on your pregnancyCathy

question: I am 9 weeks and a diabetic which makes my body more sensitive to pain, what is the best thing to take for back and muscle pain besides tylonal? Is there a muscle rub that is safe for me to use or a homeopathic salve or anything???
title: best thing for back pain
